deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title Certificate Contract
 @notice This contract manages certificate data, state transitions, and activation processes.
@notice Modifier to restrict functions to the contract owner.
@notice Modifier to allow only the linked user to access specific functions.
@notice Modifier to allow only the specific State to access specific functions.

typeDescriptions.typeString: tuple(string storage ref,string storage ref,string storage ref,enum Certificate.State,uint256,uint256,string storage ref,string storage ref,address)

documentation.text:
@notice Retrieves the certificate data along with document hash, VPHash, state, deploy time, disable time, certificate name, organization name, and owner address.
 @return The encrypted data, document hash, VPHash, state, deploy time, disable time, certificate name, organization name, and owner address.

params._activeCode: The activation code provided by the user.
params._userAddress: The address of the user activating the certificate.

params._activeCode: The activation code for the certificate.
params._disableTime: The time limit for the certificate to be disabled.
params._documentHash: The hash of the certified document.
params._orgName: The name of the organization issuing the certificate.

returns._0: The encrypted data, document hash, VPHash, state, deploy time, disable time, certificate name, organization name, and owner address.

params._disableTime: The timestamp when the certificate should be disabled .
params._newState: Indicates the state of the certificate.

activateCertificate(address,string,strin.notice: Activates the certificate if within the activation time limit.

constructor.notice: Initializes the Certificate contract with an owner and activation code.

getCertificate().notice: Retrieves the certificate data along with document hash, VPHash, state, deploy time, disable time, certificate name, organization name, and owner address.

updateState(uint8,uint256).notice: Updates the certificate's state and sets a disable time if needed.

userdoc.notice: This contract manages certificate data, state transitions, and activation processes.
